item.title: Call For Volunteers, Community over Code 2026
item.description: Community over Code 2026 will be held in Glasgow, UK, October 11-14. Community over Code is an event run by the community, for the community. That’s you! We need your help to make it a success! We are looking for volunteers for a number of community engagement tasks. These roles include: Hackathon Coordination - Help organize and run the hackathon University Outreach - Connect with colleges and universities across multiple departments Meetup Outreach - Engage with local meetup groups Speaker Support - Provide coaching and feedback to speakers Design - Create visual materials for outreach and on-site If you are interested in volunteering for any of these jobs, please:
